messages.message:
Error: Cannot call impure function during render

`Math.random` is an impure function. Calling an impure function can produce unstable results that update unpredictably when the component happens to re-render. (https://react.dev/reference/rules/components-and-hooks-must-be-pure#components-and-hooks-must-be-idempotent).

C:\Users\46464\OneDrive\諛뷀깢 ?붾㈃\DEV\choeingyu\src\features\portfolio\projects\party-event-saas\demo\components\ConfettiFireworks.tsx:13:17
  11 |             id: i,
  12 |             color: colors[i % colors.length],
> 13 |             x: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 600,
     |                 ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Cannot call impure function
  14 |             y: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 600,
  15 |             scale: Math.random() * 1.5 + 0.5,
  16 |             rotate: Math.random() * 360,
